entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow near noon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late this evening. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
